players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "This is terrible! Bob's death is a huge loss. We need to work together and think carefully about who could have done this."
Diana: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
Charlie: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Alice? That seems like an odd first-night choice."
Charlie: "I am voting for Diana. Her claim doesn't add up and she's trying to mislead us."
Diana: "I investigated Alice because she seemed the most suspicious to me initially. Charlie, if you vote for me, you're helping the mafia win. Alice is the real threat here."
You: "Diana, that's a very convenient claim to make when you can't prove it. Charlie's right - why would you investigate me first night with no information? You're clearly lying to save yourself."
